author: pdobacz
content:
Hello, we're gathering data for a matrix demonstrating which implementations pass which versions of EOF-related tests.

Here's the PR https://github.com/ipsilon/eof/pull/149, please take a look, double-check if (and which) tests of these you're running and passing and let us know in the PR (the PR only has a first guess data for now and some columns missing entirely). <@403707149043105803>  <@583892532644151312> <@508125616940515329> <@360491619402776577> <@226589605816696832>  <@429719902363058177> <@830368514225340436>  

Also, if you can provide us with a link to some CI job or pipeline which runs said tests, we could also link it up in the matrix.
